entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
